oh baby nice upload HMVinyl, ahhh i got some requests from your old torrents and if you could find these albums and upload them in vinyl flac:

Ozzy - Blizzard of OZz

and if you could find any of these it would make me god dam day:

I havent heard Fleetwood Macs Rumors yet, i like the band and i see that Rumors is one of the highest selling albums of all time hence best gotten from your torrents cause they sound so flucking good

sounds good to me, my next releases will be:
Boston - Boston
Procol Harum - Procol Harum

gimme a few days to put them out :D
Much Appreciated .... Some good shit.  Thanks.
